title: Notifi
description: An ultra-minimal focus tracker, inspired by Notionâ€™s simplicity but stripped down for daily productivity. Instead of managing long-term projects, Notifi keeps your day on track with just three core features: a streamlined checklist, an integrated lofi player, and a built-in Pomodoro timer.

title: Intellect
description: A college path and organizer website created for high school students. Features include a checklist that provides tips on what to accomplish/aim for each year in high school, resources for internships and learning, and allows users to create their own profile and allows organizer boxes.
